Help.Description: Initiates the creation of a ReactionRole

React.Description:
Error adding Reaction...
Possible error: Message reached the limit of reactions (25) please try again or use another message

Channel:
Please specify the Channel! **[Channel / ID]**

**Say 'X_X' to cancel the operation**

Role.Specify:
Please specify the Role Title! **[Role Title / ID]**nnThe Role Title will be given to the person who reacts

**Say 'X_X' to cancel the operation**

Emoji.Specify:
Please set an Emoji
The Emoji will be the emoji the user will react to!

**Say 'X_X' to cancel the operation**
Emoji.Specify_OLD:
Please set an Emoji

The Emoji will be the emoji the user will react to!nn**Say 'X_X' to cancel the operation**

Chose.Options:
__**Finally choose :**__

`1` - React adds the Position, taking the reaction removes the Position 
`2`- Reacting adds the Position, taking the reaction does not remove the Position 
`3` - Reacting will remove the user`s Position, taking the reaction will not return the Position to the user 
`4` - Reacting will remove the Position, taking away the reaction adds the Position 
`5` - Same concept as number 3 but removes the user's reaction
`6` - React to receive the Job Title and react again to remove the Job Title

**Say 'X_X' to cancel the operation.
Chose.Invalid: Choose one of the following options: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6
